mapper.insert: INSERT INTO scm_product_info (supplier_num, supplier_name, yk_num, yk_festival_id, supplier_type_id, supplier_start_city, supplier_destination, clustering_site_id, online_status, submit_status, principal, feature, activty_sales, big_category_id, little_category_id, update_date, create_date, type_subset_id, clouds_location_type, yk_theme_id, client_city_id, agency_city_id, agency_id, vendor_id, yk_director_id, back_reason, yk_name_fir, yk_name_last, info_word, model_id, start_site, start_site_time, templet_id, auto_audit_status, operation_status, register_deadline, create_login_name, give_time, group_people_num) VALUES (#{supplier_num}, #{supplier_name}, #{yk_num}, #{yk_festival_id}, #{supplier_type_id}, #{supplier_start_city}, #{supplier_destination}, #{clustering_site_id}, #{online_status}, #{submit_status}, #{principal}, #{feature}, #{activty_sales}, #{big_category_id}, #{little_category_id}, now(), now(), #{type_subset_id}, #{clouds_location_type}, #{yk_theme_id}, #{client_city_id}, #{agency_city_id}, #{agency_id}, #{vendor_id}, #{yk_director_id}, #{back_reason}, #{yk_name_fir}, #{yk_name_last}, #{info_word}, #{model_id}, #{start_site}, #{start_site_time}, #{templet_id}, #{auto_audit_status}, #{operation_status}, #{register_deadline}, #{create_login_name}, #{give_time}, #{group_people_num})
INSERT INTO scm_product_pic (product_id, img_length, first_pic, pic_name, pic_type) VALUES (#{product_id}, #{img_length}, #{first_pic}, #{pic_name}, #{pic_type})

INSERT INTO scm_product_detail_trip (trip_code, supply_code, trip_feature, file_path, trip_days, trip_nights, product_id, material, detail_info, img_path, if_default) VALUES (#{trip_code}, #{supply_code}, #{trip_feature}, #{file_path}, #{trip_days}, #{trip_nights}, #{product_id}, #{material}, #{detail_info}, #{img_path}, #{if_default})

INSERT INTO scm_product_detail_tripchip (trip_id, trip_info, trip_title, trip_content, trip_time, chip_order) VALUES (#{trip_id}, #{trip_info}, #{trip_title}, #{trip_content}, #{trip_time}, #{chip_order})

INSERT INTO scm_product_detail (starting_point_traffic_id, return_trip_traffic_id, journey_daytime_num, journey_night_num, circuit_journey, reference_journey, journey_annotation, start_off_site, cluster_modality, yes_no_cluster, headline_one, headline_two, headline_three, depart_info, urgency_people_phone, inform, join_service, people_under_num, people_exceed_num, age_under_num, age_exceed_num, age_under_protocal_num, age_min_num, age_max_num, foreign_nationality_tourist, explain_select, explain_textbox, create_date, update_date, product_id, in_price_bus_path, in_price_if_bus, in_price_airport, in_price_airport_path, in_price_visa_num, in_price_hotel_star, in_price_hotel_total, in_price_hotel, in_price_meal_info, in_price_place_info, in_price_place_if, in_price_guide_info, in_price_child_min, in_price_child_max, in_price_child_bed, in_price_child_info, in_price_tip_num, in_price_tip_info, in_price_present, not_in_price_airport_name, not_in_price_airport_path, not_in_price_airport_num, not_in_price_out_airport_num, not_in_price_visa_num, not_in_price_if_single_visa, not_in_price_if_group_visa, not_in_price_if_got_visa, not_in_price_if_tai_visa, not_in_price_selt_place, notice_pay_hour, notice_less_num, notice_less_days, notice_leave_self_money, notice_note, notice_visa_self, notice_append, notice_item1, notice_item2, notice_item3, notice_item4, notice_item5, notice_item6, notice_item7, notice_item8, if_promotion, in_price_visa_type, in_price_hotel_type, in_price_meal_type, in_price_guide_type, in_price_child_type, not_in_price_visa_type, notice_pay_type, notice_leave_self, notice_gat, not_in_price_supply4, not_in_price_supply3, not_in_price_supply2, not_in_price_supply1, not_in_price_if_safe, transportation_way, sure_plane, sure_bus, notice_if_need, not_in_price_if_plane, not_in_price_if_out_plane, not_in_price_if_room, not_in_price_if_self_place, if_headline_one, if_headline_two, if_headline_three, circuit_info_mark, join_info_remark, not_in_price_single_room, feature_describe, eat, reside, walk, travel, recreation, reco_buy, present, special_offer, significance_prompt, traffic_information, in_price_other, not_in_price_other, announcement, warm_prompt, recommend_detail, default_line, if_small, in_price_user_defined, not_in_price_user_defined) VALUES (#{starting_point_traffic_id}, #{return_trip_traffic_id}, #{journey_daytime_num}, #{journey_night_num}, #{circuit_journey}, #{reference_journey}, #{journey_annotation}, #{start_off_site}, #{cluster_modality}, #{yes_no_cluster}, #{headline_one}, #{headline_two}, #{headline_three}, #{depart_info}, #{urgency_people_phone}, #{inform}, #{join_service}, #{people_under_num}, #{people_exceed_num}, #{age_under_num}, #{age_exceed_num}, #{age_under_protocal_num}, #{age_min_num}, #{age_max_num}, #{foreign_nationality_tourist}, #{explain_select}, #{explain_textbox}, now(), now(), #{product_id}, #{in_price_bus_path}, #{in_price_if_bus}, #{in_price_airport}, #{in_price_airport_path}, #{in_price_visa_num}, #{in_price_hotel_star}, #{in_price_hotel_total}, #{in_price_hotel}, #{in_price_meal_info}, #{in_price_place_info}, #{in_price_place_if}, #{in_price_guide_info}, #{in_price_child_min}, #{in_price_child_max}, #{in_price_child_bed}, #{in_price_child_info}, #{in_price_tip_num}, #{in_price_tip_info}, #{in_price_present}, #{not_in_price_airport_name}, #{not_in_price_airport_path}, #{not_in_price_airport_num}, #{not_in_price_out_airport_num}, #{not_in_price_visa_num}, #{not_in_price_if_single_visa}, #{not_in_price_if_group_visa}, #{not_in_price_if_got_visa}, #{not_in_price_if_tai_visa}, #{not_in_price_selt_place}, #{notice_pay_hour}, #{notice_less_num}, #{notice_less_days}, #{notice_leave_self_money}, #{notice_note}, #{notice_visa_self}, #{notice_append}, #{notice_item1}, #{notice_item2}, #{notice_item3}, #{notice_item4}, #{notice_item5}, #{notice_item6}, #{notice_item7}, #{notice_item8}, #{if_promotion}, #{in_price_visa_type}, #{in_price_hotel_type}, #{in_price_meal_type}, #{in_price_guide_type}, #{in_price_child_type}, #{not_in_price_visa_type}, #{notice_pay_type}, #{notice_leave_self}, #{notice_gat}, #{not_in_price_supply4}, #{not_in_price_supply3}, #{not_in_price_supply2}, #{not_in_price_supply1}, #{not_in_price_if_safe}, #{transportation_way}, #{sure_plane}, #{sure_bus}, #{notice_if_need}, #{not_in_price_if_plane}, #{not_in_price_if_out_plane}, #{not_in_price_if_room}, #{not_in_price_if_self_place}, #{if_headline_one}, #{if_headline_two}, #{if_headline_three}, #{circuit_info_mark}, #{join_info_remark}, #{not_in_price_single_room}, #{feature_describe}, #{eat}, #{reside}, #{walk}, #{travel}, #{recreation}, #{reco_buy}, #{present}, #{special_offer}, #{significance_prompt}, #{traffic_information}, #{in_price_other}, #{not_in_price_other}, #{announcement}, #{warm_prompt}, #{recommend_detail}, #{default_line}, #{if_small}, #{in_price_user_defined}, #{not_in_price_user_defined})

INSERT INTO scm_product_activity (product_id, activity_name, detail, remark, price) VALUES
(#{item.product_id}, #{item.activity_name}, #{item.detail}, #{item.remark}, #{item.price})

INSERT INTO scm_product_detail_shopp (product_id, shop_id, shop_name, main_product, shop_info) VALUES
(#{item.product_id}, #{item.shop_id}, #{item.shop_name}, #{item.main_product}, #{item.shop_info})

INSERT INTO scm_product_detail_visa (product_id, identity_type, if_el, material, detail_info) VALUES
(#{item.product_id}, #{item.identity_type}, #{item.if_el}, #{item.material}, #{item.detail_info})

INSERT INTO scm_product_trip (product_id, trip_title, breakfast, lunch, dinner, trip_stay, create_date, update_date, trip_days, trip_describe) VALUES (#{product_id}, #{trip_title}, #{breakfast}, #{lunch}, #{dinner}, #{trip_stay}, now(), now(), #{trip_days}, #{trip_describe})

INSERT INTO scm_product_groupoffer (adult_out_price, child_out_price, adult_peer_price, child_peer_price, single_room_dif, deposit, reg_able_start, reg_able_end, reg_able_end_hour, material_able, stock, stock_warn, product_id, create_time, update_time, discount, price, status, group_date, other_peer_price, pre_single_room_dif, clean_time_hour, clean_time, first_stock, ifsure, tripid, ifdeposit, ifsingle, adult_out_onsale_price, child_out_onsale_price, group_no) VALUES
(#{item.adult_out_price}, #{item.child_out_price}, #{item.adult_peer_price}, #{item.child_peer_price}, #{item.single_room_dif}, #{item.deposit}, #{item.reg_able_start}, #{item.reg_able_end}, #{item.reg_able_end_hour}, #{item.material_able}, #{item.stock}, #{item.stock_warn}, #{item.product_id}, now(), now(), #{item.discount}, #{item.price}, #{item.status}, str_to_date(#{item.group_date},'%Y-%m-%d'), #{item.other_peer_price}, #{item.pre_single_room_dif}, #{item.clean_time_hour}, #{item.clean_time}, #{item.first_stock}, #{item.ifsure}, #{item.tripid}, #{item.ifdeposit}, #{item.ifsingle}, #{item.adult_out_onsale_price}, #{item.child_out_onsale_price}, #{item.group_no})

INSERT INTO scm_product_storemanager (productid, groupdate, instore, seat, signed, warn, shareid) VALUES
(#{item.productid}, str_to_date(#{item.groupdate},'%Y-%m-%d'), #{item.instore}, #{item.seat}, #{item.signed}, #{item.warn}, #{item.shareid})

INSERT INTO scm_product_groupprice (groupid, pricename, price, productid, tripcode, outprice) VALUES
(#{item.groupid}, #{item.pricename}, #{item.price}, #{item.productid}, #{item.tripcode}, #{item.outprice})

INSERT INTO scm_product_detail_traffic (product_id, traffic_type, tax_type, site_type, traffic_path) VALUES
(#{item.product_id}, #{item.traffic_type}, #{item.tax_type}, #{item.site_type}, #{item.traffic_path})
INSERT INTO scm_product_detail_trip_img (place_name, last_id, chip_id, img_url, img_name) VALUES (#{place_name}, #{last_id}, #{chip_id}, #{img_url}, #{img_name})

INSERT INTO scm_product_detail_hotel (product_id, hotel_name, hotel_people, hotel_days) VALUES
(#{item.product_id}, #{item.hotel_name}, #{item.hotel_people}, #{item.hotel_days})

INSERT INTO scm_product_detail_area (product_id, area_type, province_id, city_id) VALUES
(#{item.product_id}, #{item.area_type}, #{item.province_id}, #{item.city_id})

INSERT INTO scm_product_benefit (benefitcrowd, benefitnote, benefitnumber, productid) VALUES
(#{item.benefitcrowd}, #{item.benefitnote}, #{item.benefitnumber}, #{item.productid})
